pr_title: expose path to kubeconfig file that was used (#2411)

timeline.bodyText:
Why don't we store it as a File?
e.g. private File loadedKubeConfig;
timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: Nice idea. I considered using Path, which is the newer more versatile API but kept File since it fits more nicely into the existing code (less changes).
replies.author: adietish
